content.question: The authors of Source 2 most likely mentioned the subject of how the money set aside by the government for “Aboriginal Affairs” was being spent in order to

choices.label: show that Native Australians regard missionary rule as preferable to government rule
argue that government corruption is harming Native Australians
express gratitude for the public funds being used to improve Native Australians’ lives
give an example of how the relationship between Native and White Australians should be organized in the future

content.answer: argue that government corruption is harming Native Australians

topic.text: 6.3: Indigenous Responses to State Expansion from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
